TextView.android:text: Inspirron is a mobile app born out of the young mind of Akintola Oluwaseun, which is targetted at informing youths about mates that have made impact and those that are making impact. Inspirron is quite distinct from other app that gives information about icons, in that, this frames the short story in a more digestible form for a young mind, and also provides 'Food For Thought' which could be ruminated upon.This app also provides avenue for tranlating to several languages.
